companies.title: IT Support Assistant
tasks: Provided technical support to clients by troubleshooting and fixing hardware issues.
Installed and configured IT equipment, ensuring they met client specifications.
Educated customers on the effective usage of their equipment and resolved their technical queries.

companies.title: Software Engineering Intern
tasks: Assisted in developing web applications by contributing to front-end and back-end codebases.
Collaborated with senior developers to troubleshoot and debug issues in ongoing projects.
Participated in code reviews and gained insights into best practices for maintaining code quality.
Supported the team in implementing data visualization features using ReactJS and JavaScript.

companies.title: Web-based Student Management System.
tasks: Designed and developed a web application to manage student records, grades, and class schedules.
Implemented the back-end using Laravel and integrated the front-end with ReactJS for a responsive user interface.
Managed a small team to ensure timely delivery and deployment of the project.
